name: Curse of Greed: ULTIMATE
description:
Game made using the wonderful Pico-8.

Vectors possible thanks to Gabriel Crowe's pico-8 vector tools.

Games like this are possible thanks to the support of all my Patrons <3

Original Curse of Greed made for Ludum Dare 40, December 2017 (10 years exactly since my first Ludum Dare game!) - downloads still available below if you want them :)
